entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 07:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain along parts of the coast overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
